name: Giant Moto
summary: Giant Moto is a high speed, high flying racing game that's all about the jumps, turbo boosts and scoring the best time. Giant Moto features beautiful retina display graphics, iPhone 5 widescreen support, 10 challenging tracks and 4 motorcycle's to choose from. You can race against yourself or against 3 computer controlled bikes with 3 difficulty levels so it's challenging and fun for kids of all ages.
